1.name: Tm01
1.flavor_text: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.
1.effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

2.name: Tm02
2.flavor_text: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.
2.effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

3.name: Tm03
3.flavor_text: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.
3.effect: Teaches Psyshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Water Pulse Gen II: Curse Gen I: Swords Dance)

4.name: Tm04
4.flavor_text: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
4.effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

5.name: Tm05
5.flavor_text: A savage roar that makes the foe flee  to end the battle.
5.effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

6.name: Tm06
6.flavor_text: Poisons the foe with a toxin that gradually worsens.
6.effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.

7.name: Tm07
7.flavor_text: Summons a hailstorm that hurts all types except ICE.
7.effect: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Zap Cannon Gen I: Horn Drill)

8.name: Tm08
8.flavor_text: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.
8.effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

9.name: Tm09
9.flavor_text: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.
9.effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

10.name: Tm10
10.flavor_text: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.
10.effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

11.name: Tm11
11.flavor_text: Raises the power of FIRE-type moves for 5 turns.
11.effect: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: BubbleBeam)

12.name: Tm12
12.flavor_text: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.
12.effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

13.name: Tm13
13.flavor_text: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.
13.effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

14.name: Tm14
14.flavor_text: A vicious snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.
14.effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

15.name: Tm15
15.flavor_text: Powerful, but needs recharging the next turn.
15.effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

16.name: Tm16
16.flavor_text: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.
16.effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Icy Wind Gen I: Pay Day)

17.name: Tm17
17.flavor_text: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.
17.effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

18.name: Tm18
18.flavor_text: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.
18.effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Counter)

19.name: Tm19
19.flavor_text: Recovers half the HP of the damage  this move inflicts.
19.effect: Teaches Telekinesis to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Giga Drain Gen I: Seismic Toss)

20.name: Tm20
20.flavor_text: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.
20.effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Endure Gen I: Rage)

21.name: Tm21
21.flavor_text: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.
21.effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Drain)

22.name: Tm22
22.flavor_text: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
22.effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

23.name: Tm23
23.flavor_text: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.
23.effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

24.name: Tm24
24.flavor_text: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.
24.effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

25.name: Tm25
25.flavor_text: Strikes the foe with a thunderbolt. It may paralyze.
25.effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.

26.name: Tm26
26.flavor_text: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.
26.effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.

27.name: Tm27
27.flavor_text: The more the user likes you, the more powerful this move.
27.effect: Teaches Return to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Fissure)

28.name: Tm28
28.flavor_text: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.
28.effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

29.name: Tm29
29.flavor_text: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.
29.effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.

30.name: Tm30
30.flavor_text: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.
30.effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

31.name: Tm31
31.flavor_text: Destroys barriers like LIGHT SCREEN and causes damage.
31.effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Mud-Slap Gen I: Mimic)

32.name: Tm32
32.flavor_text: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.
32.effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

33.name: Tm33
33.flavor_text: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.
33.effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Ice Punch)

34.name: Tm34
34.flavor_text: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.
34.effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

35.name: Tm35
35.flavor_text: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.
35.effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

36.name: Tm36
36.flavor_text: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.
36.effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Selfdestruct)

37.name: Tm37
37.flavor_text: Causes a sandstorm that hits the foe over several turns.
37.effect: Teaches Sandstorm to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Egg Bomb)

38.name: Tm38
38.flavor_text: A powerful fire attack that may burn the foe.
38.effect: Teaches Fire Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

39.name: Tm39
39.flavor_text: Stops the foe from moving with rocks. May lower SPEED.
39.effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)

40.name: Tm40
40.flavor_text: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.
40.effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)

41.name: Tm41
41.flavor_text: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.
41.effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

42.name: Tm42
42.flavor_text: Raises ATTACK when poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
42.effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Dream Eater)

43.name: Tm43
43.flavor_text: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.
43.effect: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Secret Power Gen II: Detect Gen I: Sky Attack)

44.name: Tm44
44.flavor_text: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.
44.effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.

45.name: Tm45
45.flavor_text: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.
45.effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)

46.name: Tm46
46.flavor_text: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.
46.effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)

47.name: Tm47
47.flavor_text: Spreads hard-edged wings and slams into the foe.
47.effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

48.name: Tm48
48.flavor_text: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.
48.effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)

49.name: Tm49
49.flavor_text: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.
49.effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)

50.name: Tm50
50.flavor_text: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
50.effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Nightmare Gen I: Substitute)

51.name: Tm51
51.flavor_text: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its top HP.
51.effect: Teaches Ally Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Roost)

52.name: Tm52
52.flavor_text: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.
52.effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

53.name: Tm53
53.flavor_text: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
53.effect: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

54.name: Tm54
54.flavor_text: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
54.effect: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon.

55.name: Tm55
55.flavor_text: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.
55.effect: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Brine)

56.name: Tm56
56.flavor_text: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
56.effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.

57.name: Tm57
57.flavor_text: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
57.effect: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

58.name: Tm58
58.flavor_text: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
58.effect: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Endure)

59.name: Tm59
59.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
59.effect: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dragon Pulse)

60.name: Tm60
60.flavor_text: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
60.effect: Teaches Quash to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Drain Punch)

61.name: Tm61
61.flavor_text: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.
61.effect: Teaches Will-O-Wisp to a compatible Pokémon.

62.name: Tm62
62.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.
62.effect: Teaches Acrobatics to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Silver Wind)

63.name: Tm63
63.flavor_text: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
63.effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.

64.name: Tm64
64.flavor_text: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
64.effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.

65.name: Tm65
65.flavor_text: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
65.effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.

66.name: Tm66
66.flavor_text: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.
66.effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.

67.name: Tm67
67.flavor_text: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
67.effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

68.name: Tm68
68.flavor_text: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.
68.effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.

69.name: Tm69
69.flavor_text: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.
69.effect: Teaches Rock Polish to a compatible Pokémon.

70.name: Tm70
70.flavor_text: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
70.effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.

71.name: Tm71
71.flavor_text: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
71.effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

72.name: Tm72
72.flavor_text: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.
72.effect: Teaches Volt Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Avalanche)

73.name: Tm73
73.flavor_text: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.
73.effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.

74.name: Tm74
74.flavor_text: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
74.effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

75.name: Tm75
75.flavor_text: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
75.effect: Teaches Swords Dance to a compatible Pokémon.

76.name: Tm76
76.flavor_text: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.
76.effect: Teaches Struggle Bug to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Stealth Rock)

77.name: Tm77
77.flavor_text: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
77.effect: Teaches Psych Up to a compatible Pokémon.

78.name: Tm78
78.flavor_text: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
78.effect: Teaches Bulldoze to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Captivate)

79.name: Tm79
79.flavor_text: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
79.effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

80.name: Tm80
80.flavor_text: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.
80.effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.

81.name: Tm81
81.flavor_text: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
81.effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

82.name: Tm82
82.flavor_text: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
82.effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

83.name: Tm83
83.flavor_text: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.
83.effect: Teaches Work Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Natural Gift)

84.name: Tm84
84.flavor_text: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It may also poison the foe.
84.effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.

85.name: Tm85
85.flavor_text: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
85.effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

86.name: Tm86
86.flavor_text: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.
86.effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.

87.name: Tm87
87.flavor_text: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.
87.effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.

88.name: Tm88
88.flavor_text: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.
88.effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.

89.name: Tm89
89.flavor_text: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
89.effect: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon.

90.name: Tm90
90.flavor_text: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
90.effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.

91.name: Tm91
91.flavor_text: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
91.effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

92.name: Tm92
92.flavor_text: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
92.effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.

93.name: Hm01
93.flavor_text: Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.
93.effect: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon.

94.name: Hm02
94.flavor_text: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.
94.effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.

95.name: Hm03
95.flavor_text: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.
95.effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.

96.name: Hm04
96.flavor_text: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.
96.effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.

97.name: Hm05
97.flavor_text: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.
97.effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

98.name: Hm06
98.flavor_text: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower DEFENSE.
98.effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

99.name: Hm07
99.flavor_text: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.
99.effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

100.name: Hm08
100.flavor_text: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
100.effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Rock Climb Gen III: Dive)
